sn22.122:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṃ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
sn22.122:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami … pe …
sn22.122:4.4: “sīlavatāvuso, sāriputta, bhikkhunā katame dhammā yoniso manasikātabbā”ti?
sn22.122:4.5: “Sīlavatāvuso, koṭṭhika, bhikkhunā pañcupādānakkhandhā aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato suññato anattato yoniso manasi kātabbā.
sn22.122:4.9: Sīlavatāvuso, koṭṭhika, bhikkhunā ime pañcupādānakkhandhā aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato suññato anattato yoniso manasi kātabbā.
sn22.122:4.10: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ, āvuso, vijjati yaṃ sīlavā bhikkhu ime pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccato … pe …
sn22.122:4.11: anattato yoniso manasi karonto sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikareyyā”ti.
sn22.122:5.1: “Sotāpannena panāvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā katame dhammā yoniso manasi kātabbā”ti?
sn22.122:5.2: “Sotāpannenapi kho, āvuso koṭṭhika, bhikkhunā ime pañcupādānakkhandhā aniccato … pe …
sn22.122:5.4: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ, āvuso, vijjati yaṃ sotāpanno bhikkhu ime pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccato … pe …
sn22.122:5.5: anattato yoniso manasi karonto sakadāgāmiphalaṃ sacchikareyyā”ti.
sn22.122:6.1: “Sakadāgāminā panāvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā katame dhammā yoniso manasi kātabbā”ti?
sn22.122:6.2: “Sakadāgāmināpi kho, āvuso koṭṭhika, bhikkhunā ime pañcupādānakkhandhā aniccato … pe …
sn22.122:6.4: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ, āvuso, vijjati yaṃ sakadāgāmī bhikkhu ime pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccato … pe …
sn22.122:6.5: anattato yoniso manasi karonto anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchikareyyā”ti.
sn22.122:7.1: “Anāgāminā panāvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā katame dhammā yoniso manasi kātabbā”ti?
sn22.122:7.2: “Anāgāmināpi kho, āvuso koṭṭhika, bhikkhunā ime pañcupādānakkhandhā aniccato … pe …
sn22.122:7.4: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ, āvuso, vijjati yaṃ anāgāmī bhikkhu ime pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccato … pe …
sn22.122:7.5: anattato yoniso manasi karonto arahattaṃ sacchikareyyā”ti.
sn22.122:8.1: “Arahatā panāvuso sāriputta, katame dhammā yoniso manasi kātabbā”ti?
sn22.122:8.2: “Arahatāpi kho, āvuso koṭṭhika, ime pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato suññato anattato yoniso manasi kātabbā.
sn22.122:8.3: Natthi, khvāvuso, arahato uttari karaṇīyaṃ katassa vā paticayo;
sn22.122:8.4: api ca ime dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya ceva saṃvattanti satisampajaññāya cā”ti.
